text: Prunus brachypetala is a species of sour cherry native to Turkey, Iraq and Iran. Morphological and genetic studies show that it is a good species. Its fruit are edible and consumed locally.https://plants.jstor.org/stable/10.5555/al.ap.specimen.k000737015 ==References== brachypetala Category:Flora of Iran Category:Flora of Iraq Category:Flora of Turkey Category:Plants described in 1848 Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Gerhard Walpers
title: Prunus brachypetala
